Digital marketing for small businesses

Aurum Marketing is tailored specifically for small businesses looking to launch their online presence or get serious about e-commerce. We create holistic strategies to get you more customers and keep you in the loop on every campaign. More than just a vendor, Aurum will be your partner in navigating the digital world. Get started with a free consultation to see how your business can grow.

Services we offer

SEO

Search Engine Optimization means more customers for free. Think of it as an up front investment: we organize and optimize your website's content & metadata to maximize the amount of organic traffic your site sees.

SEM

Search Engine Marketing meets your customers where they are: be there when they’re searching for your kind of product or service. Great SEM drives engaged and interested users to your site and turns them into customers.

Display

Display advertising platforms like Facebook, Instagram, & Pinterest identify the right audience for your product. Data-driven targeting focuses your marketing dollars towards those people with whom your message resonates.

Design

Good design looks nice. Great design tells your story and converts customers. A cohesive brand identity - think logo, social graphics, your website - communicates value and helps you stand out in a crowded marketplace.

Aurum's philosophy:

"Be a partner, not a vendor"

As small business owners ourselves, we know you’re heavily invested in your venture, both financially and emotionally, and want to work with people who truly care about your goals. We get that, which is why our guiding mantra is, “be a partner, not a vendor.”

That focus on partnership means you get exceptional, boutique service:

Weekly calls, not just email updates
Holistic strategies that work across platforms
Detailed explanation of the “why” behind new strategies and campaigns
Full access to all your business’s marketing analytics, not just summaries
Honest assessments of your account's performance

We’re here to help your business reach the next level. Click below to get started.
